alert.note: Alert for Gadsden; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 5:48PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Gadsden and central Leon Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 547 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Quincy, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Quincy, Midway, Havana, Tallahassee, Freemont, Lake Talquin, Littman, Douglas City, Florence, Scotland, Orchard Pond, Jamieson, Gibson, Tallahassee Coml Airport, Santa Clara, Shady Rest, Quincy Airport, Wetumpka, Branchville and Hinson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
